00015 StegLACK::StegLACK(Config* cfg) :
00016         VoIPPacketsManager(cfg) {
00017         srand((unsigned) time(0));
00018         string seq = cfg->stegSequence;
00019         bool done = false;
00020         while (!done) {
00021                 int pos = seq.find_first_of(" ");
00022                 if (pos == -1)
00023                         done = true;
00024                 stegSeq.push_back(StegSeqElem(seq.substr(0, pos)));
00025                 seq = seq.substr(pos + 1);
00026         }
00027 
00028         intervalCount = 0;
00029         seqPosition = 0;
00030         seqFireInterval = getRandNumber(config->minStegInterval,
00031                         config->maxStegInterval);
00032         stegTransferDone = false;
00033         readStegDataToMem();
00034 
00035         VAR_(3, seqFireInterval);
00036 }
00037 
00038 void StegLACK::readStegDataToMem() {
00039         ifstream f(config->stegDataFile.c_str(), ios::in | ios::binary | ios::ate);
00040         if (f.is_open()) {
00041                 f.seekg(0, ios::beg);
00042                 while (!f.eof()) {
00043                         char c;
00044                         f.get(c);
00045                         stegData.push_back(c);
00046                 }
00047                 f.close();
00048         } else
00049                 Main::getInstance()->handleError(
00050                                 "Can't open the steganography input file: "
00051                                                 + config->stegDataFile);
00052 }
00053 
00054 vector<char> StegLACK::getStegDataToSend() {
00055         int size = config->RTPPayloadSize;
00056         vector<char> ret;
00057         for (int i=1; i<size; i++) {
00058                 lastReadStegByte++;
00059                 if (lastReadStegByte<(int)stegData.size())
00060                         ret.push_back(stegData[lastReadStegByte]);
00061                 else ret.push_back(' ');
00062         }
00063         if (lastReadStegByte>=(int)stegData.size()) stegTransferDone = true;
00064         return ret;
00065 }

00071 RTPPacket& StegLACK::getNextPacket() {
00072 
00073         vector<char> payloadData;
00074 
00075         //we are doing the sequence
00076         if ( ! stegTransferDone && intervalCount >= seqFireInterval) {
00077                 StegSeqElem se = stegSeq[seqPosition];
00078                 long delay = getRandNumber(se.intervMin, se.intervMax);
00079                 templatePacket.delay = delay;
00080                 //wysylamy steg packet
00081                 if (se.isStegPacket && ! stegTransferDone) {
00082                         payloadData = getStegDataToSend();
00083                         PRN_(1, "in steg sequence: sending packet: steg");
00084                         VAR_(1, delay);
00085                 }
00086                 //wysylamy audio packet
00087                 else {
00088                         //dodajemy audio do pakietu:
00089                         payloadData = getAudioDataToSend();
00090                         PRN_(1, "in steg sequence: sending packet: audio");
00091                         VAR_(1, delay);
00092                 }
00093                 seqPosition++;
00094 
00095                 //we finished the sequence...
00096                 if ((unsigned) seqPosition == stegSeq.size()) {
00097                         seqPosition = intervalCount = 0;
00098                         seqFireInterval = getRandNumber(config->minStegInterval,
00099                                         config->maxStegInterval);
00100                 }
00101         }
00102         //we send the normal package
00103         else {
00104                 intervalCount++;
00105                 templatePacket.delay = config->noStegRTPDelay;
00106                 PRN_(1, "sending normal packet");
00107                 //dodajemy audio do pakietu:
00108                 payloadData = getAudioDataToSend();
00109         }
00110 
00111         templatePacket.data = new char[payloadData.size()];
00112         templatePacket.dataSize = payloadData.size();
00113         for (int i = 0; i < (int) payloadData.size(); i++) {
00114                 templatePacket.data[i] = payloadData[i];
00115         }
00116 
00117         //return prepared packet
00118         return templatePacket;
00119 }

00121 void StegLACK::putReceivedPacketData(RTPPacket& packet) {
00122 
00123         //if there is space in a queue
00124         if ((int)incQueue.size() < config->incQueueSize) {
00125                 PRN_(1, "receiving package: putting it to incoming queue");
00126                 incQueue.push(packet);
00127         }
00128         //if not, it may be steg packet. normally dropped by VoIP client.
00129         else {
00130                 PRN_(1, "receiving package: no space in queue - possibly steg package");
00131                 stegPackets.push(packet);
00132         }
00133 
00134         //FIXME: tutaj powinnismy odczytac wszystkie pakiety !
00135         //if it is time to read something from the queue:
00136         if (timeSinceLastQueueRead.seeTime() > config->incQueueReadInterval) {
00137                 timeSinceLastQueueRead.start(); //restart timer
00138                 PRN_(1, "its time to read package from incoming queue...");
00139                 if (incQueue.size() > 0) {
00140                         RTPPacket p = incQueue.front();
00141                         incQueue.pop();
00142                         PRN_(1, "writing package to output audio data file");
00143 
00144                         /*
00145                         ofstream myfile (config->outputAudioFilePath.c_str(), ios::out | ios::app);
00146                         //FIXME: nie zapisuje sie do pliku :(
00147                         if (myfile.is_open()) {
00148                                 myfile.write(p.data, p.dataSize);
00149                                 myfile.close();
00150                         }
00151                         else Main::getInstance()->handleError("Unable to open output audio data file: "
00152                                                                                                 +config->outputAudioFilePath);
00153                         */
00154 
00155                         VAR((int)p.dataSize);
00156 
00157                         FileOperations::writeToFile(config->outputAudioFilePath, p.data, p.dataSize);
00158 
00159                 }
00160                 else {
00161                         PRN_(1, "incoming queue is empty.");
00162                 }
00163 
00164         }
00165 
00166 }
00167 
00168 StegSeqElem::StegSeqElem(string stegSeq) {
00169         int semicolpos = stegSeq.find_first_of(':');
00170         string timing = stegSeq.substr(0, semicolpos);
00171         string type = stegSeq.substr(semicolpos + 1);
00172         isStegPacket = (type == "S");
00173         int dashpos = timing.find_first_of('-');
00174         if (dashpos == -1) {
00175                 intervMin = intervMax = atoi(timing.c_str());
00176         } else {
00177                 intervMin = atoi(timing.substr(0, dashpos).c_str());
00178                 intervMax = atoi(timing.substr(dashpos + 1).c_str());
00179         }
00180 }
00181 
00185 long StegLACK::getRandNumber(long min, long max) {
00186         return (min + (rand() % (max - min + 1)));
00187 }
